boardgame.description: From the publisher's press release:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Each player begins by sketching a TELESTRATIONS word dictated by the roll of a die. The old fashioned sand timer may limit the amount of time they get to execute their sketch, but it certainly doesn't limit creativity! Time's up! All players, all at the same time, pass their sketch to the next player, who must guess what's been drawn. Players then simultaneously pass their guess -- which hopefully matches the original word (or does it??) -- to the next player who must try to draw the word they see -- and so on._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Telestrations contains eight erasable sketchbooks and markers, a die, a 90 second sand-timer and 2,400 words to choose from._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Inspired from the public domain game, Eat Poop You Cat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: USAopoly (USO G000264) The telephone game sketched out! Telestrations is the laugh-out-loud sketch, pass and guess party game where players simultaneously draw what they see, then guess what they saw for hilarious and unpredictable outcomes every time! It’s easy to learn, simple to play, and social, as everyone plays at the same time! Instant fun _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; laughter for 4 to 8 players, ages 13 and up Contents: 8 erasable sketch books, 8 erasable markers, 8 eraser cloths, 144 cards in card box (1,728 words), 90 second sand timer, 1 die, instructions

USAopoly (USO G000264) The telephone game sketched out! Telestrations is the laugh-out-loud sketch, pass and guess party game where players simultaneously draw what they see, then guess what they saw for hilarious and unpredictable outcomes every time! It’s easy to learn, simple to play, and social, as everyone plays at the same time! Instant fun _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; laughter for 4 to 8 players, ages 13 and up Contents: 8 erasable sketch books, 8 erasable markers, 8 eraser cloths, 144 cards in card box (1,728 words), 90 second sand timer, 1 die, instructions

USAopoly (USO G000264) Each player begins by sketching a TELESTRATIONS word dictated by the roll of a die. The old fashioned sand timer may limit the amount of time they get to execute their sketch, but it certainly doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t limit creativity! Time_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s up! All players, all at the same time, pass their sketch to the next player, who must guess what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s been drawn. Players then simultaneously pass their guess -- which hopefully matches the original word (or does it??) -- to the next player who must try to draw the word they see -- and so on. Telestrations contains eight erasable sketchbooks and markers, a die, a 90 second sand-timer and 2,400 words to choose from.
Brand new in shrink. Buyer only pays actual shipping. No charge for packaging _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; handling.
Brand new in shrink. Buyer only pays actual shipping. No charge for packaging _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; handling.

USAopoly (USO PG000264) Experience the Telestrations Effect at your next party! DRAW what you see, then GUESS what you saw. All players simultaneously sketch, pass _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; guess to reveal hilarious and unpredictable outcomes! Check out a fun demo at www.TelestrationsEffect.com Easy to learn. Simple to play. Multi-generational _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; social. Even more fun if you can’t draw! The perfect ice breaker or game night warm up.

Bayshore Hobbies is a brick and mortar store in Hamilton, On., Canada. We will ship almost anywhere. We only ship where we can use a tracking number. Email us and we will give you contact info for shipping quotes. We are closed Sundays and Mondays. We accept visa, mastercard, amex and paypal. Our website ends with a .ca
